Action.Description: TODO: use ID instead of name for localization purposes, but there seems to be multiple IDs (5B77, 59F9), not sure which one(s) are correct.

Trigger.Name: The Queen readies God Save the Queen.

Action.Description: TODO: use ID instead of name for localization purposes, but there seems to be multiple IDs (59FA, 53EF, 5B5A, 5B5B, 5B5C, and others), not sure which one(s) are correct.

How it works: 1. If this headmarker ID is DIFFERENT than the last seen marker, clear out the list of collected markers, since either the previous marker wasn't lightning, or this one isn't. 2. Unconditionally, push the marker target to the list and set StygLordlastMarker to this marker. 3. If we collected exactly 3 markers (we know they have the same ID because of #1), fire the trigger to call them out.

Trigger.RegularExpression: The Path of Divine Clarity will be sealed off

Trigger.Name: Styg End
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Path of Divine Clarity is no longer sealed

You suffer the effect of Wanderer's Fate.
Headmarker Processor 2.0 (disable if not using English or you'll get bad callouts)

Action.Description:
These are sequential-ID headmarkers like LC/wormhole. There do appear to be unrelated 27-lines in this fight.
I *think* what would work is: 1. Trigger remains inactive until we see Dahu, and remains active until we kill Dahu 2. Ignore any headmarker ON Dahu himself 3. Keep track of the last seen headmarker ID 4. If ID is different, it's a number 5. If ID is the same, then this marker and the previous are tank flares
Ignore marker on dahu himself: 27|2021-03-03T19:08:41.3310000-08:00|4000019E|Dahu|0000|D141|00CC|0000|0000|0000||2ab1f22734b80093ccfcc20e39743e75
The tank flare markers Example set 1: 27|2021-03-03T19:10:03.4290000-08:00|104A4A67|Desmond Ye|0000|0000|007C|0000|0000|0000||abe5452301765fb568389936c493824a 27|2021-03-03T19:10:03.4290000-08:00|106F8E0C|Owain Eudes|0000|0000|007C|0000|0000|0000||0bc1995ae93988fa8b352f4b207976b8
Example set 2: 27|2021-03-03T20:48:43.0710000-08:00|1066A4D9|Murphy's Law|0000|0000|0076|0000|0000|0000||f05f5e0f76f1105c6b5a088e85c491bb 27|2021-03-03T20:48:43.0710000-08:00|106461AE|Raechi Raechichi|0000|0000|0076|0000|0000|0000||bc593e1b84a591c9ba2b0e44f990ea4d
These once again do not seem to have a consistent ID, but DO have an identical ID and (theoretically) the same timestamp.

These are sequential-ID headmarkers like LC/wormhole. There do appear to be unrelated 27-lines in this fight.
I *think* what would work is: 1. Trigger remains inactive until we see Dahu, and remains active until we kill Dahu 2. Ignore any headmarker ON Dahu himself 3. Keep track of the last seen headmarker ID 4. If ID is different, it's a number 5. If ID is the same, then this marker and the previous are tank flares
Ignore marker on dahu himself: 27|2021-03-03T19:08:41.3310000-08:00|4000019E|Dahu|0000|D141|00CC|0000|0000|0000||2ab1f22734b80093ccfcc20e39743e75

These once again do not seem to have a consistent ID, but DO have an identical ID and (theoretically) the same timestamp.

Trigger.Name: Refresh State of Overlay (Uncheck me to disable overlay)

Action.Description: This trigger is responsible for showing/hiding the overlay as needed as well as re-computing the text values.
Edit the below action to move the overlay
This trigger is not triggered directly (event source = none). It is triggered by the "Delayer" trigger so that we can have sufficient delay while still having a mutex.
0 = north, +1 = 90 degrees right. e.g. right cleave, facing S = 1 (right) + 2 (south) = 3 (cleaving west)

Trigger.Name: The trinity avowed readies Glory of Bozja.
The trinity avowed readies Unseen Eye.
The trinity avowed readies Wrath of Bozja.
Like animals to slaughter, we shall cut you down.
No matter the cost, you must be dealt with.
Surrender now and perhaps we will show mercy.

Action.Description: Compiled by Wynn Dohz (xp). Hot/Cold originally by Aya, text overlay + forced march additions by Wynn. Original basic callouts (which have mostly been rewritten anyway) came from a certain discord, but I no longer wish to be associated with them due to their RMT activities. Won't name and shame, but if you know, you know. Triggers with logic by Wynn.
